info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Berkshire, southeastern Saratoga, southern Washington, Rensselaer and southwestern Bennington Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mechanicville to near Bennington. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Troy, Bennington, North Adams, Mechanicville, Hoosick Falls, Adams, Williamstown, Pownal, Grafton, Waterford, Berlin, Stamford, Florida, New Ashford, West Sand Lake, Averill Park, Center Brunswick, Wynantskill, Brunswick and Sand Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
